titles.ar: باب مَا يَسْتَفِيدُ الرَّجُلُ مِنَ الْمَالِ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُزَكِّيَ مَا عِنْدَهُ مِنَ الْمَالِ
titles.en: Chapter 15 – What the man benefits from the wealth after having purified (paid Zakāt) on what was with him from the wealth

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَشْتَرِي الْمَتَاعَ فَيَكْسُدُ عَلَيْهِ وَ الْمُضَارَبَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 16 – A man buys goods so it becomes un-saleable upon him, and the speculation

titles.ar: باب الْمَالِ الَّذِي لَا يَحُولُ عَلَيْهِ الْحَوْلُ فِي يَدِ صَاحِبِهِ
titles.en: Chapter 14 – The wealth on which a year has not passed upon in the hand of its owner

titles.ar: باب مَا يَسْتَفِيدُ الرَّجُلُ مِنَ الْمَالِ بَعْدَ أَنْ يُزَكِّيَ مَا عِنْدَهُ مِنَ الْمَالِ
titles.en: Chapter 15 – What the man benefits from the wealth after having purified (paid Zakāt) on what was with him from the wealth

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (16/49)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ الْحُسَيْنِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ جَمِيعاً عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ شُعَيْبٍ قَالَ قَالَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ جَرَّ عَلَيْكَ الْمَالَ فَزَكِّهِ وَ كُلُّ شَيْ‏ءٍ وَرِثْتَهُ أَوْ وُهِبَ لَكَ فَاسْتَقْبِلْ بِهِ.

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, and Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, altogether from Al Hassan Bin Ali Al Washa, from Aban, from Shuayb who said,
‘Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Every thing from the wealth which flows upon you, so purify it (pay Zakāt), and everything you inherit or is gifted to you, so face the next year with it’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad and al-Husayn ibn Muhammad has narrated from Mu‘alla’ ibn Muhammad all from al-Hassan ibn Ali al-Washsha’ from Aban from Shu’ayb who has said the following: “Abu ’Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Whatever you gain by means of assets, pay Zakat thereof and whatever you receive as inheritance or gift, pay Zakat thereof after a year passes.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (16/50)
text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ جُمْهُورٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ عَبْدِ الْحَمِيدِ بْنِ عَوَّاضٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَكُونُ عِنْدَهُ الْمَالُ فَيَحُولُ عَلَيْهِ الْحَوْلُ ثُمَّ يُصِيبُ مَالًا آخَرَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَحُولَ عَلَى الْمَالِ الْحَوْلُ قَالَ إِذَا حَالَ عَلَى الْمَالِ الْأَوَّلِ الْحَوْلُ زَكَّاهُمَا جَمِيعاً .

en.hubeali: Ali bin Muhammad, from Ibn Jamhour, from his father, from Yunus, from Abdul Hameed Bin Awwaz,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said regarding the man who happens to have some wealth with him, and a year passes by over it. Then he attains other wealth before a year passes by upon the former wealth. Heasws said: ‘When a year passes by upon the former wealth, he should purify (pay Zakāt) the whole of it’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Muhammad has narrated from ibn Jumhur from his father from Yunus from ‘Abd al-Hamid ibn ‘Awwad who has said the following: “I once asked abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about a man who has a certain asset which remains in his possession for one year, then he gains other assets before the passing of one year. He (the Imam) said, ‘When one year passes with the first asset, pay Zakat for both assets.’”
